rows.label: qst000505_msg0001
rows.name:
Mh, yes, I am Rhiannon's brother.
Has something happened?

rows.label: qst000505_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh...
So she did try to run away in the end...

rows.label: qst000505_msg0003
rows.name:
I can make the medicine, no problem.
I just wonder if eloping is really the
only way...

rows.label: qst000505_msg0004
rows.name:
I just want my sister to be happy,
of course. But I can't convince myself
that running is her best option...

rows.label: qst000505_msg0006
rows.name: Hey, could I ask you a favor, too?

rows.label: qst000505_msg0007
rows.name:
While I prep the medicine, how about
you go to our parents' house and hear
them out?

rows.label: qst000505_msg0008
rows.name:
I'd go myself, but, well, I can't.
I got disinherited.

rows.label: qst000505_msg0009
rows.name:
If I showed up, the whole thing might
get even more muddled...

rows.label: qst000505_msg0010
rows.name:
Our da's a stubborn old goat.
Thickheaded as anything.

rows.label: qst000505_msg0011
rows.name:
Now Ma, on the other hand, less so.
But she does generally side with him
on everything...

rows.label: qst000505_msg0012
rows.name:
Thanks!
They live in Grodd Residential Zone.

rows.label: qst000505_msg0013
rows.name:
Right, I'll get to it then.
I should have the medicine ready
when you're back.

rows.label: qst000505_msg0101
rows.name:
Our pig-headed parents have a house in
Grodd Residential zone.

rows.label: qst000505_msg0102
rows.name:
Why don't you go talk to them
while I prepare the medicine?

rows.label: qst000505_msg0201
rows.name:
Hey, welcome back.
I just finished with the medicine.

rows.label: qst000505_msg0202
rows.name: So? What did they say?

rows.label: qst000505_msg0203
rows.name:
...I see.
Yep, still stubborn...

rows.label: qst000505_msg0204
rows.name:
It might just be because they
worry about us, their kids...

rows.label: qst000505_msg0205
rows.name:
I really don't know what the
right answer is here...

rows.label: qst000505_msg0206
rows.name:
Well, the future is a distant and murky
thing, and nobody knows what will be.

rows.label: qst000505_msg0207
rows.name:
...Uh, no time for this, though, is there.
Here, take this medicine to Rhiannon,
and quickly.

rows.label: qst000505_msg0208
rows.name:
She'll know what to do with it.
Good luck.

rows.label: qst000505_msg0301
rows.name:
Please take the medicine to Rhiannon.
Good luck.
